chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hill of the Golden Dawn
chapters.info: Sei'cair, p. 100 (117)—What Feraighin calls Perrin. I do not know what it means, though I suspect something along the lines of “Eyes of Gold” (compare to al'Cair'rahienallen, “Hill of the Golden Dawn” and sei'mosiev, which means “downcast eyes”). See Aybara, Perrin t'Bashere.
